title: Affordable healthcare for all!
excerpt: Everyday people are paying more out of pocket than ever before for basic GP visits. Everyone should be able to see their GP without worrying about how much it will cost. Sign the petition to demand urgent government action to make healthcare accessible for all!
description: Everyday people are paying more out of pocket than ever before for basic GP visits. Everyone should be able to see their GP without worrying about how much it will cost. Sign the petition to demand urgent government action to make healthcare accessible for all!
